framework.objective: Structure the user's prompt into a machine-parseable plan for a GPT assistant.

title: A professional Linkedin profile photo of this face as a confident man in a dark navy suit, white shirt, black tie, and richard mille watch. He is standing with arms crossed, looking directly into the camera with a serious but approachable expression. The background is softly blurred with warm bokeh city lights, giving a modern corporate vibe. Studio-quality lighting highlights his face evenly, sharp focus, high resolution, 85mm portrait lens effect, professional headshot.
task: Convert natural-language prompt into a structured instruction set for a GPT-style assistant.
intent: Generate a clear, reproducible, and machine-parseable specification of the user's ask.

inputs.raw_prompt: A professional Linkedin profile photo of this face as a confident man in a dark navy suit, white shirt, black tie, and richard mille watch. He is standing with arms crossed, looking directly into the camera with a serious but approachable expression. The background is softly blurred with warm bokeh city lights, giving a modern corporate vibe. Studio-quality lighting highlights his face evenly, sharp focus, high resolution, 85mm portrait lens effect, professional headshot.
